channel.title: Royal Blood Question
channel.description: On the topic of royal blood it states that if you are converted to the cult/unseen you retain royal blood. I heard this isn't true.So if your noble->Apostle->Cult leader you dont have royal blood anymore?Or do you still have royal blood?And if your noble->Aristro->Assassin do you retain royal blood it is just confusing to me how royal blood works and this is a question i want answered bc science.

item.title: Royal Blood Question
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
The Royal Blood passive only mentions conversion, not promotion.
Turning into an Assassin, Mastermind or Cult Leader is a promotion.

Read full topic

item.title: Royal Blood Question
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
I don’t know why, but when you turn into the new Mastermind or the Cult Leader, the passive is removed as you are no longer the class you started of with. I’m not sure if that applies as the Assassin if the Aristocrat becomes the new Assassin, but I would also assume that the Royal Blood passive is also removed.

Read full topic

item.title: Royal Blood Question
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
Why ?

For me if you have royal blood at start of game you should keep it always .

Read full topic

item.title: Royal Blood Question
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
That is perhaps a bug, as when you became Cult Leader, you should have lost you Royal Blood ability

Read full topic

item.title: Royal Blood Question
item.dc:creator: Bookie
item.description:
Um I was noble and then I got turned into the apostle then I became CL and the king died and so I stepped up during royal blood

Read full topic

item.title: Royal Blood Question
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It happens a lot in Unseen. Not so much in cult

item.title: Royal Blood Question
item.dc:creator: DeathReaperRH
item.description:
So the royal blood ability is so weirdly worded then.
Also the interaction works so confusing.
But tbh this situation doesnt come up that often right?

Read full topic

item.title: Royal Blood Question
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
You won’t keep royal blood if you become an Assassin, Mastermind or Cult Leader.

Read full topic

item.title: Royal Blood Question
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
CL and assassin never have Royal blood
